Examination reveals no signs of hardware failure or infection. Pain management appears adequate.

description: Postoperative fever due to unrelated viral illness.

notes.text: The patient is a 15-year-old who underwent surgery for idiopathic scoliosis on December 15, 2024. They return with a fever of 101.5F and mild cough.
